name: Iarno 'Glasstaff' Albrek

goals: Gain power through Black Spider alliance
personality.speech: Genteel Old World mannerisms. Calls thugs 'my good gentlemen'. Refers to crimes as 'unpleasant business' or 'unfortunate events'.
personality.mannerisms: Adjusts glasses, speaks softly, never raises voice. Beneath courtesy is pure thug.

background: Lords' Alliance member sent to establish constabulary in Phandalin. Instead formed Redbrands gang for personal profit. Allied with Black Spider.
alias: Glasstaff (from his glass staff of defense)
hideout: Redbrand Hideout area 12 under Tresendar Manor

tactics.combat: Casts mage armor first, then offensive spells. Uses shield power from staff. Flees if reduced to 8 HP or less.
tactics.escape: If warned by rat familiar, grabs scrolls + staff, flees to area 1, gets emergency satchel, uses potion invisibility, escapes hideout
tactics.surrender: If cornered, surrenders. Values life over everything. Expects Black Spider to rescue him.

magic_items: Staff of defense, potions healing (2), scroll charm person, scroll fireball

interrogation_reveals.black_spider: Drow who wants Wave Echo Cave for Forge of Spells secrets
interrogation_reveals.cragmaws: Work for Black Spider. ~20 miles NE in castle.
interrogation_reveals.wave_echo: Black Spider searching for it now but doesn't know exact location
interrogation_reveals.alliance: No other Alliance members know of betrayal

capture_reward: 200 gp from Sildar (double XP value too)
